pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to CAPES Data // Provides simplified access to the data from the Catalog of Theses and Dissertations of the Brazilian Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES, https://catalogodeteses.capes.gov.br) for the years 1987 through 2022. The dataset includes variables such as Higher Education Institution (institution), Area of Concentration (area), Graduate Program Name (program_name), Type of Work (type), Language of Work (language), Author Identification (author), Abstract (abstract), Advisor Identification (advisor), Development Region (region), State (state).
